    #include<iostream>
    using namespace std;
    void swap(char &s1,char &s2)
    {
    char temp;
    temp=s1;
    s1=s2;
    s2=temp;
    }
    int main()
    {
    int t;
    long long int n,i;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
    cin>>n;
    long long int a[n+1];
    char s[n+1];
    cin>>s;
    for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
    {
       cin>>a[i];  
    if(i!=a[i])
    swap(s[i-1],s[a[i]-1]);
    }
    cout<<s<<endl;
    }
    return 0;
    }
